body:
CREATE TABLE $SchemaName$.$TableName$s (
    $TableName$Id   SMALLINT    NOT NULL
  , $TableName$Name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
  , CONSTRAINT PK_$TableName$s PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ($TableName$Id) WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = PAGE, FILLFACTOR = 100)
  , INDEX IU_$TableName$s$TableName$Name UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED ($TableName$Name) WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = PAGE, FILLFACTOR = 100)
)

INSERT INTO CI.Lookups (
                           SchemaName
                         , TableName
                         , WHEREClause
                       )
VALUES (
           '$SchemaName$', '$TableName$s', NULL
       )
       
INSERT INTO $SchemaName$.$TableName$s (
										  $TableName$Id
										,  $TableName$Name
									  )
VALUES (1, '$CURSOR$')
